comments.body: Nit: Should we include this as a log message and then have a more concise error message? It seems a little strange to have a multi sentence error message.

i prefer to not change anything other than casing in this pr to ease review.

the pr is making a number of small changes across a wide area of the code tree so getting all the reviews/approves will be hard enough and changing stuff makes this harder to review than needed.
